subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=uc|rs=金05}}

# [[matte]]: the molten [[metal]] [[sulfide]] [[phase]]s typically formed during [[smelt]]ing of [[copper]], [[nickel]], and other base metals

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かわ}}

Cognate with {{m|ja|皮|tr=kawa||skin, rind}} and {{m|ja|革|tr=kawa||leather}}, from the way the [[matte]] may form a [[skin]] over the surface of the metal being [[smelt]]ed.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かわ|hhira=かは}}

# [[matte]]: the molten [[metal]] [[sulfide]] [[phase]]s typically formed during [[smelt]]ing of [[copper]], [[nickel]], and other base metals
